mapper.insert: insert into p_user_balance_log set user_id=#{userId}, balance_type=#{balanceType}, amount=#{amount}, balance=#{balance}, order_id=#{orderId}, trade_type=#{tradeType}, subject=#{subject}, sub_subject=#{subSubject}, create_time=#{createTime}, status=#{status}, remark=#{remark}
mapper.update: update p_user_balance_log set user_id=#{userId}, balance_type=#{balanceType}, amount=#{amount}, balance=#{balance}, order_id=#{orderId}, trade_type=#{tradeType}, subject=#{subject}, sub_subject=#{subSubject}, create_time=#{createTime}, status=#{status}, remark=#{remark} where id = #{id}
